params.text: Prompt patterns are reusable prompt structures that improve reliability. They are based on a 2023 paper that catalogues patterns for LLM prompting.
My template API supports /render and /execute and estimates tokens. A/B tests compare baseline prompts with pattern prompts across multiple models.

params.text: If the client timeout is smaller than the server timeout, requests will fail. Increasing the timeout to 120 seconds resolves the issue.
The library contains more than 10 prompt patterns. Each pattern is stored as a JSON template with placeholders, and the API uses string substitution to render prompts.
